name: The Apartment (itch) (EpicLevelWizard, xXsamageXx)
description:
<< CONTROLS >>

Desktop - Arrow keys

Mobile - Swipe

This is a short experience about living in an apartment. 

I basically made this as a small experimental project, and as a way to learn my way around Bitsy,

I'm pretty happy with how it came out, and I hope you enjoy it!
